    • Constructor Detail

      • Car

        public Car​(java.lang.String mod,
           int a,
           java.lang.String plate,
           boolean diesel)
        This function serves as a constructor of the class Car
        Parameters:
        mod - A string with the model name
        a - An integer with the purchase date
        plate - A string with the plate number
        diesel - A bool that contains whether the car is diesel or not

      • Car

        public Car​(java.lang.String mod,
           int a,
           java.lang.String plate,
           boolean diesel,
           User owner)
        This function serves as a constructor of the class Car in case you indicate the owner
        Parameters:
        mod - A string with the model name
        a - An integer with the purchase date
        plate - A string with the plate number
        diesel - A bool that contains whether the car is diesel or not
        owner - A parameter of type user which contains the owner of the car

        public int numWheels()
        Function that returns the number of wheels in a car
        Specified by:
        numWheels in class Vehicle
        Returns:

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Function to print Car information
        Overrides:
        toString in class Vehicle
        Returns:

      • getPollutionIndex

        public PollutionIndex getPollutionIndex()
        Function that checks for the pollution index of a Car
        Overrides:
        getPollutionIndex in class Vehicle
        Returns:
        It returns C as the pollution index if the car is diesel and if not it calls to the original getPollutionIndex function
